mapper.select: SELECT p.address, p.rent_type, p. property_type, p.deposit, p.month_fee, p.maintence_fee, p.roomsize, r.total FROM property p, maintence m, roomoption r WHERE p.property_no = m.property_no and m.property_no = r.property_no AND p.property_no = #{property_no}

SELECT max(p.deposit) maxdeposit, min(p.deposit) mindeposit, round(sum(p.deposit)/count(*)) avgdeposit, max(p.month_fee) maxmonth, min(p.month_fee) minmonth, round(sum(p.month_fee)/count(*),1) avgmonth, max(p.maintence_fee) maxmaintence, min(p.maintence_fee) minmaintence, round(sum(p.maintence_fee)/count(*),1) avgmaintence, max(p.roomsize) maxroomsize, min(p.roomsize) minroomsize, round(sum(p.roomsize)/count(*),1) avgroomsize, round(sum(r.total)/count(*),1) avgoption FROM property p, maintence m, roomoption r WHERE p.property_no = m.property_no and m.property_no = r.property_no AND p.address like '%'||#{address}||'%' AND p.rent_type = #{rent_type} AND p.property_type = #{property_type}
